summary:
If you want to use my follower in your own mod please give me credit.
<br/><br/>This is my first mod so please to rate too harshly. He is a thief/assassin type follower with a glass sword. He is at the Riverwood Inn. He is unkillable and is compatible with "Amazing Follower Tweaks". He should be compatible with anythin
descriptionHtml: A Follower mod That I created as my first mod.  I don't know if you can download this with Nexus mod Manager or Mod organizer so I recommend doing a manual installation.  Forgive me if I get this wrong but I think you just have to put this in your Skyrim data.  Try doing it with Mod Organizer or Mod Manger first though.
author: Corduero
